events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your resume and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the upcoming steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the feedback was very positive.
Thank you for promptly responding to our scheduling request for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You completed the technical interview with strong performance, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview was completed successfully, and the team was impressed with your alignment and enthusiasm.
We are excited to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation.
You have accepted the offer and provided positive feedback about the hiring process and communication.
Congratulations! You have officially accepted our job offer and will be joining the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with the distribution of necessary documents and access to company resources.
The hiring process for this position has been successfully closed following your formal start date and integration.
